feed.title: Visualization Portfolio - STAT 479 Spring 2022
feed.subtitle: Student visualizations from the Spring 2022 edition of Statistical Data Visualization at UW Madison.

entry.title: Student Test Scores
entry.content: Societal factors impact us all more than we think. Societal factors can heavily influence someone’s educational success and success in life. This fictional data set from Kaggle allowed. Click here to visit the interactive app.
entry.summary: Societal factors impact us all more than we think. Societal factors can heavily influence someone’s educational success and success in life. This fictional data set from Kaggle allowed. Click here to visit the interactive app.

entry.title: Private Equity Investments Network
entry.content: Private Equity Investments are always in the shadows moving big money around publicly traded companies. The aim of this portfolio is to shed light on the actions of these investment firms. Mapping out their vast empire of publicly traded companies is a step in facilitating a more openly traded market system. Read the portfolio by clicking here.
entry.summary: Private Equity Investments are always in the shadows moving big money around publicly traded companies. The aim of this portfolio is to shed light on the actions of these investment firms. Mapping out their vast empire of publicly traded companies is a step in facilitating a more openly traded market system. Read the portfolio by clicking here.

entry.title: Formula 1 Racing
entry.content: An interactive graph for analyzing the best drivers of formula 1 since 1950-2020 based on race wins and the teams dominating the constructor’s championship based on the points. Click here to visit the interactive app.
entry.summary: An interactive graph for analyzing the best drivers of formula 1 since 1950-2020 based on race wins and the teams dominating the constructor’s championship based on the points. Click here to visit the interactive app.
